projects.title: Python translator
projects.description: A web based Python translator, that uses Flask to process written text through the Translator API. It translate texts seamlessly, without one needing to reload the page.

projects.title: TelegramBot - Python
projects.description: A Telegram Bot made in Python. You can order pizzas through it (or any other product) and it will appear as an order in the orders page when the customer has completed his purchase. The bot is available at @SalesOrganizerBot, the username being BuyerAssistant. The code is available at my GitHub.

projects.title: USP - Python course
projects.description: A python course where we made a game as a final project.

projects.title: FIAP - Python course
projects.description: A python course I made later in 2022 so I could improve my Python skills.

projects.title: FIAP - Java course
projects.description: A Java course I took which helped to hone my skills with OOP and Java.

projects.title: Azure - Microsoft
projects.description: An Azure course where I refined concepts of cloud, cloud computing and how Azure itself works.

projects.title: CS50 - Harvard
projects.description: A Harvard Computer Science course in where I became better at Python and C. We also practiced Web Development with Python, using the Flask framework, with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, as well as databases using SQL. We have also learned data structures such as hash tables and linked lists.

about_me: I'm an IT student learning Python, C# and JavaScript along with HTML and CSS. I am fluent in English, and I've just finished Harvard's CS50x course. I'm now taking the CS university.

formation.description: An 18 months course, where I finished with an average grade of 95/100.
